A '''potion of Luck''' is a potion that provides [[Luck]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
Potions of Luck can be obtained via [[commands]], and is also available in the [[Creative inventory]].

=== Brewing ===
While the base potion of Luck cannot be obtained via [[brewing]], it can still be brewed into a splash potion or a lingering potion.

{{Brewing
|head=1
|Gunpowder
|base = Potion of Luck
|Splash Potion of Luck
|name = Splash Potion of Luck
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base = Splash Potion of Luck
|Lingering Potion of Luck
|name = Lingering Potion of Luck
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Luck'''
|foot=1
}}
